analytic.title: Reinforcement Learning based on On-line EM Algorithm

abstract.p: In this article, we propose a new reinforcement learning (RL) method based on an actor-critic architecture. The actor and the critic are approximated by Normalized Gaussian Networks (NGnet), which are networks of local linear regression units. The NGnet is trained by the on-line EM algorithm proposed in our previous paper. We apply our RL method to the task of swinging-up and stabilizing a single pendulum and the task of balancing a double pendulum near the upright position. The experimental results show that our RL method can be applied to optimal control problems having continuous state/action spaces and that the method achieves good control with a small number of trial-and-errors.
